mil3.5.3:0.3: Question on Knowing the Unsurpassed Nature of the Buddha
mil3.5.3:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, is it possible to know that the Buddha is unsurpassed?”
mil3.5.3:1.3: “Yes, your majesty, it is possible to know that the Blessed One is unsurpassed.”
mil3.5.3:1.4: “How, venerable Nāgasena, is it possible to know that the Buddha is unsurpassed?”
mil3.5.3:1.5: “In the past, your majesty, an elder named Tissa was a teacher of writing and many years have passed since he passed away. How is it that he is still known?”
mil3.5.3:1.7: “In the same way, your majesty, whoever sees the Dhamma sees the Blessed One, for the Dhamma was taught by the Blessed One.”
mil3.5.3:3.1: Question on Knowing the Unsurpassed Nature of the Buddha third
